comm: nice start from Umesh. Full on off, not much movement. Warner stays in his crease to defend
fuller again on middle and off. No swing at all. Warner presents the full face of his bat in defense
tight lines - on middle and off. Blocked
138 kph, fuller than a good length. A hint of away shape but Warner comes forward to defend to cover
stays a touch low  this time. Length delivery outside off, keeps low but Warner keeps it out
140 kph. Maiden to start. Length delivery outside off, crisply driven straight to cover
poor start from Bhuvi. Full delivery down leg, Finch tickles it fine without any fuss and will pick up four free runs.
better. 135 kph, outside off and full. Some away swing as well. Finch comes forward, pushes to mid-off and sets off for a quick run
sloppy from cover. Very full outside off, some away shape again. Warner drives straight to cover, Rohit lets it go through for a couple
nice comeback. Full and swinging away from Warner's bat, pushed to mid-off
length again outside off, defended to cover
this one comes back in prodigiously. Nice to see swing from Bhuvi. Ducks back in late and Warner is struck on the pad, but the ball was sliding down leg
137 kph. Nice line and length that. Good length outside off but not too wide. Finch leaves
superb stroke. Offers the full face of the bat and just times a checked drive to the mid-off boundary. Kept it simple and eased four more. Very full on off from Umesh
that one climbed steeply from a good length. Outside off and Finch withdraws his bat
140 kph, length outside off. Chopped down to wide backward point for a run
again some variable bounce. Lands it on a good length on off and middle, Warner checks his flick after the excessive bounce
clipped to mid-on and Warner comes through for one. Good running
poor delivery. Full and wide, swinging away too. Warner frees his hands and flays a cut to the cover boundary. Easily done. Bhuvi under a bit of early pressure
good length on off, Warner tucks to the leg side and finds mid-on
137 kph, full and straight. Driven to mid-on
what a shot that is. Fuller than a good length on off, Warner gets on top of the bounce and whips this into the gap at midwicket for four. Exemplary timing takes it to the boundary

not great bowling this from Bhuvneshwar. Drops this one short, and the ball just sits up for Warner to pull to the square leg boundary. Another easy boundary. Not generating enough pace to trouble Warner, either
excellent stuff. Taps one to point with soft hands and calls "yea" immediately.
back of a length on off. Worked to square leg after rising on his toes
drifts on Warner's pads this time, worked past square leg for a couple
141 kph. Wow, a shot of Australia's intent in this game. Full outside off, Warner stays in his crease, bends down on one knee and belts the ball down the ground past mid-off for four.
better length that. Back of a length on middle, played to square leg off the back foot
digs one in on leg, nice bouncer too. But Warner goes after the pull and gets a thick top edge which flies down to the fine leg boundary. Good change in length that. Australia scurrying along

supreme dominance from Warner. Not a bad delivery at all, length on off. Warner goes back and just whips the ball into the vacant midwicket region and the ball goes to the boundary on the back of some terrific timing
decent start from Ishant. 141 kph. Outside off and full, Finch comes forward and meets it with a forward defensive stroke
excellent shot again but he finds short cover does Finch. Very full, overpitched. Finch cover-drives elegantly into the ground
fuller length again outside off, Finch doesn't get all of it. Pats back

what has happened there? Just a terrific shot, straight drive, just evades the stumps and clatters into the shin of umpire Kettleborough. And then goes back to take out a bail. Would have gone for four if not for the interference. Ouch
hit on the up straight to mid-off

just rubbing it into the Indian fielders. Nothing can be done about that, though. Finch plays one to square leg and calls for a run. The fielder picks up cleanly and throws at the non-strikers end but the ball hits Finch and ricochets the boundary. 5!
quite full but straight, drilled to mid-on
oh my. Banged in but way down leg. Would have been wide to a left-hander
50 up for Australia. That sat up again for Finch to dispatch. Back of a length on middle, finch pounces on the length and clobbers the pull over square leg for another boundary. Ominous signs these
length delivery outside off, punched off the back foot to cover
slower ball, good change in pace. 118 kph. Finch lobs a late cut to third man in the air
another slower delivery outside off, bounces a touch as well. Warner keeps it down to point
and another slower delivery. Almost carries to point as well. Warner tries to cut but the ball spoons up off the outside half.
good length on off, the perfect length to Finch, in my opinion. Finch gets on his feet to push to mid-on
142 kph. Good length outside off, inside-halved to square leg
back of a length outside off, Finch defends
fullish length outside off - fourth-stump line. Played defensively
143 kph. Back of a length outside off, punched to mid-off from the back foot
and Finch pinches a run off the final ball again to Ishant. Tucks a length delivery to midwicket
good start. Full on off, Finch pushes to mid-on
oh wow. Finch tries to put Bhuvi off his length, runs down the track to try and loft over the bowler but the ball swerves back in to take the inside edge and then down to fine leg
another fumble from Rohit. Finch drives to Rohit at cover and he lets it go through, the batsmen sneak one
136 kph, back of a length outside off. Warner goes back to pull but the ball hurries on to him and he can only flat-bat an awkward stroke to mid-off
good delivery. Fuller than a good length outside off, pushed to cover
fullish length down leg, pings off Warner's pads towards square leg
full on off, driven back to Ishant
back of a length outside off, defended into the off side
steered down to third man
nice slower delivery on off, gets some cut on the delivery. Warner defends respectfully
lovely shot again. Just a good length delivery on middle, Warner presents as much of the face as possible but flicks to midwicket for three
fullish on off, played down to mid-on
fullish on off, Warner closes the bat face to find a gap at midwicket
full on off, not overpitched. Finch nudges to square leg
finch backs away and Bhuvi follows him, inside edge down to fine leg

it'll go down as a drop but the ball has taken Bhuvneshwar's hands with it to the boundary. Fullish on off and middle, Warner powers a lofted drive back. Bhuvi gets a hand on it belatedly and the ball lobs up to the mid-on boundary. He seems to be writhing in pain
slightly wide outside off, Warner laces a cut to point
very close with a direct hit. Fullish delivery outside off, Warner plays it down to point. Jadeja collects cleanly and misses the non-striker's stumps.
very slow and tossed up on off, 77 kph. Warner watchfully defends
nicely bowled, tossed up again outside off. Warner comes down and drives back

oooh, just wide a of a diving short fine leg. Suddenly, the spinner creates a chance. Warner wants to take him on and goes for a sweep, connected but doesn't get required elevation. Beats him for four
defended back
nurdled to deep midwicket for a run
shortish delivery on off, Finch backs away and punches a drive to long-off with ease
122 kph, some inward movement to leg, Finch drives to mid-on for a run
good stop there from the prowling Rahane at midwicket. Back of a length, Warner pulls
123 kph. Yorker on off, nudged to midwicket
slower delivery outside off but ends up as a half-volley. Warner drills to wide mid-off
124 kph. Short and very wide. Finch reaches for it and cuts to deep point
back of a length on leg, Warner misses his clip and is struck on the thigh pad
tossed up on middle, worked to square leg
slightly shorter on leg. Finch plays it fine off his hips for one
flighted but short and wide, Warner crunches a cut to the sweeper cover
floated on off, Finch wants to go over the infield on the off side but can only outside-edge to third man

slog swept for six to bring up Warner's fifty. Very good innings this. Gets down to a flighted delivery and nonchalantly lofts it over square leg. These are not small boundaries, but the ball clears with ease
tossed up on off and middle, blocked
nudged to deep midwicket
fullish delivery on leg, slower delivery. 121 kph. Drilled to long-on
128 kph. Full on off, pushed to long-on
Warner backs away to a full delivery outside off, chopped to point
on the bounce to midwicket. Shortish delivery on middle and Warner latches on the opportunity but finds the fielder
full and wide outside off, driven to cover where Rohit makes a good diving stop. Two successive overs of three from Dhawan, nice stuff.
tossed up on middle, tucked to deep midwicket
slog swept for four on the bounce. Warner gets down early and lofts it easily over midwicket, on the bounce to the boundary.
defended off the front foot
tossed up yet again on off, drilled to long-off
finds the gap this time that he was looking for in the last over. Backs away, makes room for himself and lofts the ball with so much ease over cover.
shortish down leg, off Finch's pads towards fine leg
reverse swept for four. Easily done from Warner again. Makes it look so easy. Gets down early and plays it all along the ground past short third man
and another boundary. Makes himself some room and belts a drive to the cover boundary. Exceptionally easy for Warner.
drilled to long-on with the spin
tossed up on middle, pushed to long-on.
another boundary. Runs leaking here for India. Flat again outside off, Warner cuts and cuts fine past point.
overpitched on middle, pushed to long-on
back of a length on off, Warner pulls to midwicket
very wide outside off, Warner tries his best to reach it but he can't. Wide
big appeal. Not given by umpire Wilson. Good length on leg, the ball skids on to hit Warner on the pads. Pitched outside leg and high
full and tailing back in to hit Finch on the pads, sliding down leg
turned to midwicket
overly full outside off, skewed to the sweeper cover
short and wide, cut straight to point
a little bit of turn. Slowed up on middle, finch squirts a drive to third man. Finch rushes back for the second
full and straight, blocked
very well played. Similar delivery , tight on off. Finch opens the face of the bat to find a gap at cover
flat on off, pushed back
slightly slower down leg, Warner skips down to turn to short fine leg. Would have been close with a direct hit
flat and quick on off, defended
played quietly into the off side for a quick run
quick legcutter outside off, 125 kph. Finch taps to the bowler
slower delivery on middle and off, pushed down to long-on. They ease for the first run but Warner quickly scampers back for two. Excellent running
back of a length outside off, punched to long-on

lands just in front of Rahane at cover this time. Short and wide, sat up for Warner to crunch. He smashes it in the air but landed on the bounce. Rahane seems to have done something to his hand as well
shortish outside off, punched to deep cover
wow, what was that? Warner got in shape very early for a switch hit but Jadeja saw it and improvised, fired a flat delivery down his leg side but Warner executes a fine late cut to fine leg/third man
defended off the front foot
and again, Warner backs away but Jadeja fires it down leg
driven back to Jadeja
flat on leg, Warner clips to midwicket who makes a good diving stop
full and wide, finch misses an opportunity as he finds mid-off
clipped to midwicket
good delivery, 123 kph, back of a length on off, Warner can only play it back despite looking to go over the off side
very close with a direct hit. Warner dives full length but the fielder at mid-on misses. They get an overthrow as well. Fullish length outside off, driven to mid-off
slow, short and wide. Dabbed to third man
slower legcutter on middle and leg, tucked straight to midwicket
Warner advances down to drive to long-on with the spin
slowed up on middle, Finch pushes with the spin to long-off once again
very full and flat on leg, long-on is found with a drive
goes on the back foot to open the face and find the gap through cover for one to bring up his fifty
flat on off, Warner makes room but finds cover with a cut
flat on middle, Warner shimmies down to drive to long-on
short and wide, chopped down to third man
inside-edged down to third man after the ball skidded on to Finch's cut
slower legcutter outside off, drilled to the sweeper cover
slower delivery but down leg, Finch flicks to square leg
good length outside off, flat-batted down to mid-off.
back of a length outside off, dabbed to third man.Warner wanted two but was wisely sent back
good length on off, Warner makes room to drive on the up to cover
132 kph. Driven to mid-off
good length outside off, a sixth-stump line. Pushed to cover from the crease
137 kph. Fullish length, tailing back in to hit Finch on the pads high
tight again from Bhuvi. Length delivery on middle, tamlely patted to long-on
only two of the over. Good length on middle, tucked to midwicket.
slower ball on leg, pushed to midwicket
smashed. Six. Big hit. Full delivery on off, Finch backs away and goes over the infield and clears the mid-off boundary easily. With mid-off inside, it was a rather safe shot
cut wide of point for a couple. A touch short but not a terrible delivery
length on middle, worked to square leg
goes for it this time. Fuller length on middle, Warner swipes the ball over midwicket. Ishant runs around from long-on and cuts it in
Finch flays a cut to deep point
back of a length on off, tucked to midwicket
good length and straight, Finch flicks nicely past midwicket for a couple of runs.
easily tickled off his hips to the fine leg boundary. Finch stands tall and just utilizes the ill-directed delivery to earn some runs
smashed for another six. Very full on middle, Finch just times his loft easily over midwicket. Used all his power
another boundary, runs coming all too freely suddenly. Shortish and wide, Finch cuts past point for four.
shortish outside off, chopped down to backward point
slower ball down leg, clipped to square leg for another easy brace. Warner quick as ever
123 kph. Full on middle, Warner drives to long-off
141 kph, good length outside off. Pushed to long-on for one.
another slower offcutter, looks a concerted effort to do so. Pushed to long-on
good length outside off, inside-edged onto his pads
amazing running. Ishant is not at all happy and lets out a grunt of discontent. Tucked past midwicket, and the pair rush back for two. Not much the fielder could have done actually.
flat on leg, turned to midwicket
swept powerfully to deep square leg
wider of the crease, flat on off. pushed to cover
flat again on off, punched off the back foot to cover
tucked to square leg for one. Looked like they were were interested in two
worked to fine leg. Very flat and quick down leg
rubbish ball, a half-volley on the pads with fine leg in the circle, Finch stays in his crease and flicks wide of that fielder to the long leg boundary
he's lucky to get away with a wide there, it was full and down leg side, Finch tried to glance again but could not connect
good length around off, dropped with soft hands close on the off side

bowled him! Warner mows across the line but the length is not short enough as the ball angles across him, he inside edges it on to middle stump. Finally some respite for India ... Warner returns to the team with an innings that has set Australia up for a huge score
a huge appeal for lbw as the ball angles in from a good length and hits the top of the pad, was a bit high and going down leg side
good length on off side, Marsh gets behind the line and defends with a straight bat
driven off the front foot through cover point for a single
gets on the front foot to a straight ball on off and middle and defends
stays back and cuts the ball to point
tossed up fuller on off stump from around the wicket, driven to mid off
pushed off the front foot through the covers for a single
bowled flat and quick on middle stump, defended back to the bowler
played back to the bowler again, that hurried him for time
138 kph, fullish on middle. Finch finds midwicket with his flick
slower legcutter on off, patted defensively to midwicket
shortish and wide, Finch guides down to third man. Bhuvneshwar fumbles and allows the second.
another straight legcutter and Finch finds midwicket yet again
shouts of 'catch it' but the ball fell well short of short fine leg. Legcutter on the pad, finch flicks on the up
Marsh hustled for pace and movement. The ball sneaks through bat and hits him on the thigh pad as he tried to drive
flat on middle, worked to midwicket
very full and straight, finch defends off the front foot
shot. Lovely deflection. Took it off the keeper's gloves to late cut to third man for three. Used Jadeja's pace
flat and full outside off, pushed to short mid-off
round-arm action on off, driven defensively
flat on middle, pushed back to the bowler
splendid batting. Finch rushes to 99. Shortish on middle and Finch pounces on the opportunity and nails the pull to the backward square leg boundary. Very good placement
good length on off, steered to point. Marsh wanted one, Finch didn't
and he gets there with a neat tuck off his hip towards midwicket for one. He raises his bat and jumps in joy, with some fist-pumping as well. He is pleased. Superb innings. How much can he make?
back of a length on off, pushed to cover
fullish on off, Marsh finds mid-on once again
short and wide, missed opportunity. Marsh finds cover with an ill-timed cut
flat on middle, Finch defends
flat on leg, Finch backs away, opens the face and guides to deep point
round-arm action from wider of the crease, Marsh shimmies down and finds cover
finds a gap through cover this time with a neat drive. Long-on cleans up
well bowled from Jadeja, sees Marsh coming down and fires it slower and wider. Marsh pushes it to short mid-off
hit to cover. Another dot to Marsh
four to begin. Short on middle, Finch powers a pull to the midwicket boundary. Easily done
too short again on leg, Finch flicks but finds short fine leg
superb shot. Full outside off, Marsh goes over mid-off and clears it comfortably. Much needed boundary for his own confidence
good length on off and middle, pushed back
back of a length on a fifth-stump line. Pushed to cover.
back of a length on leg, tickled fine towards backward square leg
sees Marsh coming again and fires it flat and wide, defended
gets down early and smashes the slog sweep for four. On the bounce. Slightly tossed up on middle and that is all he needed to get under it and get the elevation over midwicket
hit out to deep cover
shortish on leg, Finch makes room and cuts to point
massive appeal, not given. Looked very close. Flat on middle, Finch goes to sweep but misses. Struck pretty much in front, but was that sliding down leg? Yes, adjudges the umpire.
cut to point for a quick run
back of a length outside off, the ball climbs steeply and beats Finch's outside edge
inside-edge onto the pad. Nice length
very short down leg. Wide

Ishant takes the catch from mid-on. Good length on off, Finch goes for the pull but the ball bounces and takes the outside half. The ball lobs up and Ishant runs around from mid-on, even as Kohli from midwicket was running back. Ishant keeps his eyes on the ball and hangs on comfortably. And then has a word with Kohli. Big wicket, nonetheless, and a very timely one
fullish outside off, driven past cover to mid-on for one
140 kph. Beaut. Pitches on a good length on off and deviates away to beat the outside edge of Smith
overly full outside off, driven to cover
flat on off, whipped to long-on
flat on off, clipped to midwicket
lovely shot. Runs to the pitch, opens the face to drive to deep cover
fired in outside off, a drilled drive evades short mid-off for one
yikes, Smith falls over as he tries to sweep. Fired in wide outside off, Smith misses the sweep and is struck on the pad
oh no, poor way to end. A high full toss on middle and Smith puts it away with ease to the midwicket boundary. Easily done once again. Another needless boundary conceded by India.
legcutter down leg, tickled to midwicket
slower delivery on a good length on leg, whacked down to long-on

nicely played. Very nice. Shortish delivery outside off but Smith walks across, and pulls it easily past short fine leg for a boundary. Makes it look so easy, the fine leg fielder just about reached there but the ball won
worked to midwicket
another whip pats short fine leg. That was straighter but he used all his wrists to get that fine
slower delivery outside off, Marsh goes for a big heave-ho but misses completely

six. Just clears the deep square leg fielder. Dhawan at the boundary was lurking and felt like he was in it but the ball lobbed over. Fuller length on middle and Smith just short arm-jabbed that with the wrists
shortish delivery on middle, worked to deep midwicket
shortish outside off, swatted to long-off
slower delivery on off, nurdled fine to fine leg for a quick couple. Runs starting to flow again
full on off, clipped to the sole fielder in the circle - midwicket
full down leg, spoons up of either bat or glove into the leg side

lovely shot again. Comes down to the pitch and whistles a drive to the long-on boundary. Umesh Yadav runs around and tries to keep it in, but his hands is in contact with the ball while also touching the boundary
shortish delivery outside off, thrashed to deep cover
swatted away to deep midwicket
tailing back in on off and middle, driven to long-on
shortish outside off, muscularly powered to long-off. Just missed the bowler's leg as well
low full toss, driven to long-off. Smith hustles back for the second. Really good running
massive. Just humongous. Right in the slot from Ishant, full outside off. Smith just launches the swipe way over midwicket. Went deep into the first tier. So easily done.
goes around the wicket, yorker outside off but Smith flicks this wide of square leg. Those wrists in action again
slower ball on middle and off, turned to fine leg for a couple more. Already 10 of the over
full down leg, Smith goes for a conventional reverse sweep but misses. Ishant has a word with Smith. No wide
shortish on off, worked fine again. Fine leg cleans up
what power. Jabbed to the midwicket boundary. Very full on off, Marsh just whips this with power to the boundary
another awful delivery. Full toss on middle, Smith just needs to flick this and he does it with nonchalant ease to the square leg boundary, in fact over. Six free runs for Australia
worked into the off side for a quick run
splendid running again from Smith, swatted to deep midwicket but Smith hurries back for the second
good length on off, 127 kph. Flat-batted to long-off, two more runs.
back of a length down leg, hits Marsh on the stomach as he misses his pull
fullish length outside off, Smith walks across but cannot find any bat on his attempted flick
full and wide outside off, inside-edged to fine leg
slower ball outside off, well-disguised. Smith shovels to fine leg

slogged to long-on. Virat takes an easy catch running in.l Another slower delivery outside off, Marsh goes for the sweep but can only lob it up. The ball took the outside half the bat, and the bat turned in his hands which contributed to the lack of distance. Marsh's middling innings ends

almost six. That is ridiculous. Not sure if he meant that though. Shortish delivery outside off, Smith looks to flat-bat it down the ground but the ball flies over point and lands just inside the boundary. What a fifty
tickled very fine to square leg
107kph, slower delivery outside off, Cut out to point
142 kph. Back of a length on middle, Maxi can't find bat on his shot
drifts down leg, wide
full on leg, mis-timed to long-on but Smith hustles back for the second
slower one outside off, Maxi backs away, then shuffles across to swipe to deep midwicket

taken. Very good catch from Gurkeerat at fine leg. A nothing delivery on middle stump, Smith goes for the heave but gets a top edge which flies to fine leg. Goes very high in the air and hangs there for quite a while. Mann backtracks, comes forward, backtracks and takes it
146 kph, pushed to long-on for a run
Maxwell backs away but Ishant follows him. Shovelled to deep midwicket
120 kph. Slower delivery outside off, chopped to cover
full on leg, just a neat tuck past square leg for two runs
140 kph, full and wide outside off. Bailey completely misses a lofted drive
slow legcutter outside off, Bailey rasps a cut over point for two
another slower ball outside off, Bailey cuts wide of point for one
Maxwell covers all his stumps, looking for a ramp but the ball is speared in the blockhole. Squeeze to midwicket
brilliantly executed yorker. Maxwell is struck on the boot and he hobbles to the other end.
helped on its way to fine leg for three. Gurkeerat runs around and fumbles while diving, allowing the extra run
another yorker. Speared in. Maxwell jams it out to cover
146 kph again. Yorker which is smeared back over the stumps, two more as long-on mops up

misses his length this time does Ishant but he gets a wicket. Full on middle, Bailey smashes it high in the air towards long-on, Rohit runs around and takes a good catch. Great over this, but 11 still come off it.
'Finisher Faulkner' goes for a golden globe. Nice slower delivery on middle, Faulkner gets down to try and sweep but the ball keeps a touch low and sneaks through to rattle into the stumps.
down leg, pings off Wade's pads towards fine leg. Wade scampers back for the second. Makes it with a full-length dive. Out with a direct hit

gone. Wade is run out this time. Slower delivery outside off, played towards point. Maxi calls Wade through. Wade is a little slow to get off and pays for it with his wicket. Rohit returns the throw on the bounce, and Yadav backtracks to the wicket to take the bails off. Good work
lovely shot. That will be four. Full yorker on middle, Maxi moves across and ramps it over fine leg for four. Good connection, excellent execution
another boundary. Slower ball outside off, full toss. He gets down on one knee and sweeps it over square leg
low full toss on off, pushed to cover
bad ball. Very poor stuff. Short on Maxwell's hips and he just helps it on its way over fine leg. He did not have to work much for those six runs. Ishant misses his length badly and pays for it
oh man. What a sensational shot that is. Full outside off, tailing back in. Maxwell gets down, watches thew ball and helps the ball over short third man with a deft reverse lap. Beautifully done.
four more. Full on off, Maxwell backs away and laces a drive over cover this time. Another boundary
slower delivery down leg. Maxwell misses his heave
picked his shot and executed really well. Backed away just a touch and mis-timed the lofted drive over mid-off. Did not get all of it

what a catch from Pandey to finish. Just a sensational catch. Length on middle, Maxi pulls but doesn't get all if it again, his feet is parallel to the ground as he flies for the take. Great grab. But Maxwell has played a blinder
flat delivery outside off to start, skids on with the arm. Defended off the back foot
goes after it immediately. gets down early and sweeps hard and over square leg for four. Drifts down leg which aided Rohit in the execution of that stroke. Good shot though
worked off his pads, and with the little spin, to deep midwicket
shot. Floated up outside off, lovely drive to cover
and again, tossed up little wider. Cover fumbles this time, writhing his hand. One run
nice delivery, stays around the wicket. Flat on off, pushed to mid-off.
full and wide, a hint of away shape. Smashed to wide mid-off from Dhawan, looking good with those drives.
nicely dragged back. Good length outside off, steered to point.
driven on the up. Fuller on off, drilled with a foot to the pitch, to mid-off
shortish length with some away movement, guided down to third man
back of a length outside off, Rohit plays it by his feet and looks for one but is sent back
nice delivery that. Fullish enough on middle, a thick inside edge to short fine leg. Would have been very close had he missed
tossed up on middle but overpitched, driven to mid-off for one
ooh, iffy shot. Looked to go over mid-off but did not get all of it at all, but got enough. Clears mid-off
superb shot. Races to the pitch of the ball, keeps his head over the ball and just lofts the ball delectably and with exemplary timing over midwicket for  gigantic six. Made it look so easy again
flat on leg, tucked to square leg
ooh, just wide of Warner at cover. Tossed up outside off, Dhawan goes for the drive but fails to keep it down. The ball just evades the diving fielder. Four nonetheless
shortish outside off, played past late cut for a few runs. Played that really late
fullish on middle, pushed back to the bowler
139 kph. Good length outside off - fourth-stump line. Defended down into the ground, past his stumps
short and wide, cracked away to backward point who does well, but they run through for one
full on middle, pushed to midwicket
yorker on off, Rohit gets bat down in time and closes the bat face to flick to deep square leg
nice change in length. Digs one in short outside off, Dhawan sees the ball go past is nose
good run that. Length delivery outside off, pushed into the off side and runs immediately. Bailey picks up and throws but Rohit makes it with a full-length dive.
lovely start. Good length on middle, Dhawan can only defend
138 kph, back of a length on leg, the ball sneaks through and strikes Dhawan on the thigh pad
135 kph. Shortish length on middle, Dhawan pulls awkwardly to square leg
not a great delivery. Drifting on Dhawan's hips, picked off to fine leg
nicely played. But that is sensational fielding from Lyon at the third man boundary. Back of a length outside off, Rohit opens the face to guide very fine

clears the square leg boundary. Very full on middle, Dhawan premeditated the shot and swiped it high, very high ,over the square leg boundary. Wonderful execution. Cleared the infield and that's what mattered
back of a length on off, played to slip
fullish outside off, driven to cover off the front foot
just wide of cover again. Very sweetly timed but failed to keep it down. Fullish delivery outside off, Dhawan times a drive on the up. Races to the cover boundary after beating the fielder
dabbed to third man
picked off his pads to deep midwicket for three. Did not look like more than two but it was sufficiently in the gap
137 kph. Shortish outside off, guided past point for a couple.
136 ks, length delivery outside off, Played down to point
back of a length outside off, punched to extra cover
ramped down to third man off the open face
pulled to fine leg
nice end. Fullish outside off, Rohit keeps it down with a slightly angled bat to find the gap to third man
134 kph, a hint of away shape outside off. Rohit plays it by his feet

smashed into the stands. What a shot that is. And a one-handed stunner from someone in the stand. Richardson drifts down leg, Rohit just lifts it off his pads with so much ease over the boundary. A flick-swipe
good length on off, defended
shortish delivery and pummeled over the midwicket boundary yet again. Superb stroke-making. Doesn't go back, just pulls it from the crease
and that will be four more. Short delivery down leg this time, Rohit helps it on its way to the fine leg boundary. Easy runs

gone. What a poor ball, but Rohit has to go. That is a real shame. Drifts down leg, and Rohit looks to flick but the ball kisses the glove. Wade scurries along and takes a lovely diving catch. Rohit's blitz ends.
drifts down leg, wide
back of a length on off, Dhawan defends off the front foot
Hastings is a bit too straight at the moment. Dhawan just flicks this past square leg for another boundary.
good length outside off, guided to point
138 kph, full and straight. Pushed to mid-on
fullish on middle, played to midwicket. An unnecessary throw is well backed up by Maxwell
quite a good end that. Top-of-off line and length, defended
what a shot to start from Kohli. Full and wide from Faulkner, Kohli just times his square drive past point for a boundary. That is his first ball and he generates such superlative timing
full outside off, driven to mid-off
better from Faulkner. Full on off, Kohli defends watchfully, under his eyes
four more runs. Shimmies down the track and cuts past point for another boundary. Kohli, now, making it look all too easy
pushed towards cover for a run. Nicely played
and again, Dhawan needs to just help one off his hips to deep midwicket

wow. What was that. Dhawan at his very confident best. Shortish outside off, Dhawan runs down and swats the ball over point, both feet off the ground while playing the stroke, and that is six. Unbelievable stuff.
shortish again, cut to point
tucked to deep midwicket
139 kph, length delivery outside off. A mis-timed drive to cover
back of a length on off, Kohli stays back and blocks under his eyes
a neat dab to third man for one
just wide of Faulkner. Good length on off, hit a tad on the up to mid-off
nicely directed bouncer on Dhawan's badge, pulled away to fine leg
fuller length on off, steered to point from the back foot
flies to the boundary. Shortish delivery outside off, a tad too wide, enough for Kohli to throw his hands at it and finds the gap past cover.
once more. Faulkner bowls a length delivery outside off, Kohli shimmies down and lofts it easily over cover for four.l
full on off, defended
short and a bit too wide, cut out to the sweeper cover
skips down the track to flick to long-on with use of those wrists
some more flight outside off, driven to the sweeper cover
he goes inside-out this time. Making it look so easy. Comes closer to the pitch and lofts the ball over cover, against the spin
shortish down leg, clipped down to fine leg
straighter with a bit of loop, pushed back to the bowler
shortish delivery down leg, kisses the glove again but four for Kohli. Runs away to the fine leg fence.
fullish length outside off, pushed to the sweeper
full and tailing back in on off, worked to midwicket
very full outside off, drilled to deep cover. Lyon misfields and fumbles to allow the second
full on middle, nurdled to midwicket
fullish ball outside off, a caressed drive to deep cover
slower through the air outside off, cut out to deep point
worked to midwicket with the spin
slightly slower on leg, Kohli comes down to clip to deep midwicket
good delivery. Slower but straight on off, defended
powerfully swept to backward square leg.
uses his feet to come closer to the pitch, and drive to long-on
134 kph. What was that? Short delivery outside off, climbing steeply. Kohli wanted to pull but withdrew very late, the ball struck the face of the bat and went straight down
too short on middle, pulled to deep square leg
dabbed to third man

oh, lucky for Kohli. Slower delivery down leg, a rather poor delivery. Kohli pulls but top-edges. The ball plonks in front of fine leg, Hastings does well to throw it back in while crossing over the boundary
played down with soft hands towards gully
tight end. Full on off, blocked
poor start. Drifts down leg. Nurdled very fine for a couple.
flat down leg. Wide
worked down to fine leg
short and wide, thrashed to deep point
flat down leg, Kohli sweeps hard to fine leg
flatter on off, Dhawan squirts one towards midwicket
not good bowling. Dragged down short outside off, Dhawan pounces on the pull and belts it away over midwicket for an easy boundary. Dhawan brings up a good fifty as well
slower delivery down leg, helped down to fine leg
slower delivery on off, pushed back to the bowler
short delivery down leg, Dhawan rockets a pull to deep square leg
116 kph. Slower delivery on leg, pulled powerfully to deep midwicket
nice delivery. Slower on off, defended
another poor delivery, another boundary. Dhawan pulls past short fine leg for a boundary. Got on top of the bounce, but didn't keep it down. Was wide of the fielder anyway
128 kph. Back of a length on middle, worked to midwicket
did not quite get enough of it. Back of a length on middle, Kohli executes the pull over midwicket for a couple
four more. Back of a length outside off, Kohli flays the cut in front of point for four more. Easy
fifty for Kohli now. Short delivery, Kohli rolls his wrists on it, keeps it down and finds the gap at backward square for a couple
patted down to point
136 kph, picked off his hips to deep square leg
too straight, just nudged past midwicket for two
whacked to deep square leg
excellent run that. Pushes a good delivery to mid-off for one. Very tight stuff but he made one out of that
swiped away to deep square leg, a touch short from Marsh
shortish delivery outside off, Dhawan shimmies down but chops to point
short again outside off, Dhawan creams a cut to the deep cover for a run
full delivery outside off, Dhawan tries to drive but inside-edges onto his pad
fullish outside off, hit away past cover for a brace.
a touch short outside off, cut to deep point
very tight stuff from Richardson. On middle and a good length, Dhawan can only tap back
there is that boundary ball. Short on middle, Dhawan pulls powerfully in the gap at backward square leg for four. Made that look easy
and even better. Presents the full face of the bat to drive past mid-off for another boundary. Superb shot
short of a length but the line is down leg side, Kohli tries to work it off his hips behind square but misses
gets behind the line of a straighter short of a length delivery and defends on the leg side
pushed from the crease to the right of the fielder at point for a single
uses the angle into him from around the wicket to tuck the ball off his pads through square leg
strays down leg side again for the second wide in the over
a length ball outside off, punched through the covers for a single
steps out of his crease and drives a length ball on the up towards wide mid off
a risky single but the throw from mid on does not hit at the bowler's end! Kohli had pushed to the fielder and run, the man was closer in the circle, might have been tight had he hit
the slower ball outside off stump, Kohli drags it through the leg side with a swipe across the line
a fuller ball at faster pace outside off, Kohli drives off the front foot to deep cover
steps out of his crease to get close to the ball and drives along he ground through cover
played to mid off, they decide against the single
short of a length angling across the right-hander, Kohli stays back and guides the ball towards backward point
short of a length angling into the left-hander, pulls behind square for another single
legbreak on a  decent length, spins into Dhawan from over the wicket, played back to the bowler
closes the face of the bat too early on the front foot to play on the leg side but the leading edge falls safely short of cover
a full ball driven powerfully off the front foot to the cover boundary, the fielder dives full stretch and at top speed but the ball wins
a high full toss outside off, hit straight to the man at cover
bowled flat and straight, punched off the back foot to long on
steps out to drive but can't find the gap at cover
that is massive. What a huge six from Kohli. Comes down to the pitch and wallops the ball, deep over long-on. Has a look at Faulkner immediately. Wow, that is some hit, 103-metre hit
shortish delivery outside off, guided down to third man
good change up. Short delivery after seeing Dhawan advancing, Dhawan pulls out of his shot
another shortish delivery outside off, Dhawan ramps the ball off the open face to third man. They get two
good change up, nice slower ball outside off, The ball goes under Dhawan's bat
another slower ball outside off, back-of-the-hand legcutter. Dhawan drives past cover for a run. Decent comeback in the over, but expensive
oh nicely landed, fullish on off. Dhawan comes down but taps it back
again, drags the length back seeing Dhawan advancing. Dhawan adjusts well too, pushes to mid-off for one
shortish outside off, cut to deep point
slowed up on off, defended
rockets to the backward square boundary. Another four. Dhawan gets down early and smashes the sweep past short fine leg
and that is another boundary. Tossed up, Dhawan runs down to smash the ball over mid-off. Runs leaking, and all too easily.
four more. Another boundary. Skips down the track and whips the ball past midwicket, long-on has no chance
goes down for the sweep and finds square leg
another exuberant swipe but this time he doesn't get all of it, inside-halves to deep midwicket
flat on off, pushed to cover
another boundary. Dhawan goes down early and executes the reverse sweep this time. In the gap and that'll be another four runs. Smith looking clueless
ooh, just short of mid-on. No real need for that shot. Comes to the pitch and drives on the up but lands in front of Hastings.
lovely shot. Stands tall and punches a length delivery to deep cover off the back foot. The fielder does well to keep it in
crack. Short and wide, Kohli creams a cut to deep cover
easy run. Just pushes a full delivery to mid-on for one
full outside off, punched to cover
bowled from wider of the crease, on off. Kohli pushes to cover
guided down past point to third man
tossed up wider outside off, drilled to long-on
nicely bowled, nice run. Tapped towards point
another boundary. Got to the pitch and whipped a boundary past midwicket. Races to the long-on boundary
tossed up on off, defended
that is a bad ball. Short and wide, Kohli laces a cut to point
good comeback, flat on middle. Nurdled to square leg
fullish outside off, guided to point
advances and deflects it late to third man
uppish but safe. Good length outside off, Kohli looks to go over mid-off but the ball lobs up off the outside half to third man
nice bouncer. Well-directed. Dhawan sways out of the line
shortish length outside off, cut to point
140 kph. Another short delivery outside off, pulled to deep square leg
comes down to chip over the bowler's head for a couple. Nicely played
whew, that has flown to the square leg boundary. Tossed up on middle, Dhawan sweeps and sweeps hard to the fence
tossed up on off, defended
100 for Dhawan. What an innings this has been. He raises his bat in trademark fashion. Fired in outside off, Dhawan guides the ball past point for four. Sensational innings from Shikhar
tossed up on middle and leg, worked down to fine leg
slightly shorter on off, tickled to midwicket
length on off, Dhawan comes down to push in front of point for one
shortish outside off, the ball comes in a touch. Awkwardly hit to cover
fullish length coming back in, sliced to point. Kohli wanted one
short delivery on middle, pulled down to fine leg
a hard pull races to the deep square leg fielder
smashed away from the crease to deep cover
full outside off - fifth-stump line. Defended to cover
tucked fine to backward square leg, just the one
very good run that. Fullish outside off, Dhawan chops into the ground and Kohli calls him through. Wade fires at the non-strikers end and would have had the wicket with a direct hit
turned to midwicket
what a shot but he finds cover. Wow, that was creamed but he found the fielder. A tad too full
sensational shot again but he finds the fielder once more. Gets down on one bended knee and thrashes a drive but extra cover is in place
good delivery. Sees Dhawan advancing and digs it in short, Dhawan pulls to deep square leg
supreme. this time he finds the gap through extra cover and he gets four. Just a punch. Shortish delivery from hastings with too much room
carved down to third man
shortish on leg, pulled powerfully to fine leg
118 kph, good length on off, guided to point
low full toss outside off, missed opportunity. Driven to mid-off
113 kph, cross-batted swipe to the backward square leg boundary. A very bad ball though. Dhawan flicks this in the gap. Shot.
full and wide, Dhawan goes for it and gets a thick outside edge which flies down to third man. Two more
fullish outside off, driven to mid-off

Bailey claims the catch. The umpires get together and they go up to the third umpire. The soft signal is not out. Short and wide, Dhawan laces a cut to point. It looks like the ball has bounced. That should be an easy decision. Dhawan pretty much knew as soon as he hit it.
132 kph, fullish outside off, driven to cover
shortish delivery down leg, Kohli tucks to square leg for one to move to 99
and he gets there with a brace. Comes down to loft the ball over extra cover to get to his second successive century. He has looked on the mark from his first ball. Great to watch, great innings
guided past a diving point fielder for two more.
whipped over midwicket for a run
nice yorker on off, Dhawan backs away but finds point
another well-executed yorker on off, jammed to cover
squirts a drive to the sweeper cover. Nice over that. Kept it simple.
smashed over mid-off for four. Raced down to the pitch and got sufficiently under it to clear mid-off.
not timed at all. Slower delivery on middle, Dhawan comes down and swats the ball to long-on
good length outside off, driven to cover
low full toss on off, creamed to deep cover
great fielding from Lyon at deep midwicket. Very full on middle, Dhawan swipes this in the air
nice drive. Crisp to mid-off. Just the one though as mid-off fields
whoa, that slipped out. A very high full toss from Hastings. Dhawan tries to reverse sweep but cannot connect well enough
very full on middle, drilled to mid-off
another good yorker. Smith, very sloppy while fielding, at mid-off allows the extra run after a misfield.

the misfield seems to have done Australia a favour. Can that change things? Or is too little too late? Dhawan goes. End of a scintillating knock from Dhawan. A smashing 126. A slower delivery outside off and Dhawan goes for the cut but cannot keep it down as backward point takes it.
full and wide, inside the tramline. Left alone
back of a length, coming back in. Dhoni inside-halves down the pitch

Dhoni goes now. The crowd goes wild. Legcutter outside off, Dhoni comes down to try and manufacture a shot. He pokes at it and gets a thin outside edge which is gratefully accepted by Wade. Australia not out of it, just yet.
flat outside off, blocked back
flat again, wide though. Kohli shimmies down but blocks back
turned to deep midwicket, nicely played
tossed up on off, pushed back to the bowler
angled wider. Gurkeerat drives to mid-off
nudged to square leg off the pad

Kohli finds the fielder. What is happening here? A nothing delivery from Richardson, fullish on leg. Kohli comes down the track and lobs a catch to mid-off. Just spooned up. Looked like a checked drive. Big big wicket. But, that has been a truly special innings from Kohli.
fullish on off, driven to cover
back of a length on off, defended off the back foot
crashed through covers for a couple. Too wide from Richardson.
not a great delivery, length down leg. Worked to square leg for one
136 kph, clipped off his pads to deep midwicket. One more. Successful over for Australia
nice shot from Gurkeerat. Lofts the drive over mid-off, against the spin that too. Got under it enough to get the desired elevation.

taken by Shaun marsh. Gurkeerat persishes now. Flat on middle and leg, Gurkeerat goes for the big sweep but gets a top edge which goes very high in the air. Marsh circles around from square leg and takes a catch overhead. Pressure catch. Australia are right in it
flat on middle, nicely played to square leg with soft hands. Rushes back for the second. Good batting
fullish on middle, driven to mid-on for a quick run
tossed up on off, blocked under his eyes
comes down nicely, works it to square leg for another brace. Very well played. Another successful over for Australia
130 kph, back of a length outside off, cracked to point
big appeal, pitched outside the line it appeared. Struck Jadeja right in front and a bit high, but that was always not out.

oh, an overthrow now. Direct hit from Finch to the non-strikers end, the ball ricochets for an extra run. Hit to mid-off for a quick run. The umpire comes in Hastings' way in fact. All unintentional of course
steered to third man

did that carry? Smith claims it. The slip fielder takes it. Smith put himself in there and takes a very good low catch. Full delivery outside off, Rahane tries to guide to third man but gets a thick outside edge. Smith takes it. Massive wicket. India are six down now.
back of a length on Rishi's ribs, played to backward square leg. And another successful over for Aus.
shortish outside off, cut to deep point
flat on off, Dhawan plays late to third man with an open face. One run
good single there. Fullish on off, Jadeja plays it towards point for one
flatter trajectory but slow on middle. Defended
slowish on middle, defended again
plays that very late, outside off and Dhawan plays it fine past third man for a couple. Nice stroke.
very good short bouncer. Well-directed. Jadeja is late on the pull and is beaten.
another overthrow. Somewhat sloppy from Australia. Patted into the point region for a quick single, the throw misses the stumps and they get an extra
fullish and wide, crashed to the sweeper cover. Looking for two but they won't get it
oh what a shot. Not sure what kind of field that is. Length delivery on off, Dhawan rushes down and flat-bats a shot past a very short mid-off for four. Superb execution
shortish again on off, Dhawan gets on top of his toes and pulls to deep midwicket for a couple

Dhawan has to go now, he has holed out to the sweeper cover. Full delivery, cross seam from Richardson outside off. Dhawan comes down the pitch to try and loft over cover but the ball skews off the outside half. Goes high in the air and Warner settles under it to take a good catch.
nice tight start. Length on off, played quietly to point
Wade drops one. Good length outside off, Bhuvi guides one off the face of the bat to Wade who spills it while diving. Burst out of the glove, but should have been taken. Big chance
good length, blocked
fullish on off. Jadeja pushes the ball to cover
chopped down to third man for a run
133 kph, clipped to wide mid-on for a quick run. Just three of the over. Good for Australia but could have been a lot better
full outside off, Bhuvneshwar goes for an expansive drive, an adrenaline-driven shot. Beaten.
the ball climbs steeply now and swerves past Bhuvi's outside edge. Lovely length that, hitting those 'hard lengths'

taken now. Bhuvneshwar carves this with tentative hands and tentative feet to first slip. Smith makes no mistake.  A shortish delivery that outside off. Richardson has a five-for. What an astounding turnaround this.
length delivery outside off, left alone
what a massive heave-ho that was. Full delivery outside off, Yadav tries to hit it back to Melbourne. Misses completely.

and another. Would be interesting to see if he connects well with these. Fullish outside off, Yadav goes for it with all his might again. No connection. Only a dot ball. Wicket maiden to end his spell
length on off, pushed towards cover for a run
length delivery on leg, Yadav is hustled for pace and is struck on the pad high up
this is not clever slogging from Yadav. Doesn't keep his shape, or his eyes on the ball. Just goes after an almighty swing. Missed
length outside off, Yadav is beaten
full on off, driven back to the bowler
finally he gets bat on it, but all he will do is get one. Things just not happening for India. Slogged to deep midwicket
full and wide outside off, another slog. Another miss

Richardson drops a sitter. Should have been taken that. Full delivery and Yadav goes for another of his slogs. This one goes straight up. Richardson runs in from long-off and spills a relatively easy chance.
another drop. Wade has spilled another chance. Short outside off, Jadeja goes for a the cut but gets a thick outside edge, Wade leaps up high and drops yet another

this time, Bailey intervenes and takes it. Fuller length on off, Yadav is not changing his technique, another wild slog. the ball goes up again, but nowhere near enough distance. Bailey, from point, has a look at Smith and then settles under it to pouch it.
fullish on off, played down to the keeper
full and wide, left alone. Six events in that over
full yorker outside off, smeared back
very wide outside off. Wide this time
nudged to long-on for two. Played that with soft hands and was able to get back. Good batting that.
wide yorker outside off, Jadeja gets some bat on his late deflection and the ball goes for four to third man
slower back of the hand legcutter outside off, Jadeja misses
another slower legcutter that bounces extra outside off, Jadeja cannot get bat on it again
another slower ball outside off, the legcutter spins away from Jadeja and he is beaten. Ishant comes down but is sent back.
full and wide outside off, Ishant beaten
and that will be the game. Marsh takes the final wicket. 18 in succession at home for Australia. Full delivery outside off, a thick outside edge is easily taken by Wade. Australia go 4-0 up.
